roleset.name: to settle

example.name: passive
example.text: The former congressman , who resigned as speaker of the House after an investigation of his financial dealings , is ensconced in his district office , maintained by taxpayers on a $ 200,000 allowance .

propbank.arg: The former congressman , who resigned as speaker of the House after an investigation of his financial dealings
in his district office , maintained by taxpayers on a $ 200,000 allowance

roleset.note: ENSCONCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ensconce' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from ensconce.01-v predicate notes)
